data.eml:eml: Review of the leafhopper subgenus Pediopsoides (Sispocnis) (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Eurymelinae, Macropsini) with description of two new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Hu, Li, Juan, Dai, Ren-Huai (2019): Review of the leafhopper subgenus Pediopsoides (Sispocnis) (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Eurymelinae, Macropsini) with description of two new species from China. ZooKeys 855: 71-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.855.33591, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.855.33591
